LatestLedger.title: latestLedger
LatestLedger.description: The sequence number of the latest ledger known to Soroban RPC at the time it handled the request.

OldestLedger.title: oldestLedger
OldestLedger.description: The sequence number of the oldest ledger ingested by Soroban RPC at the time it handled the request.
